scripts.install:playwright: bunx playwright install chrome && bunx playwright install-deps
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:repo && bun run clean:sdk && bun run clean:server:api:ws && bun run clean:server:api:rest:auth && bun run clean:server:api:rest:asset && bun run clean:server:api:rest:inference && bun run clean:server:state && bun run clean:client:web_babylon_js && bun run clean:cli
scripts.clean:sdk: cd ../sdk/vircadia-world-sdk-ts && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && cd browser && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist
scripts.build:all: bun run build:sdk && bun run build:server:api:ws && bun run build:server:api:rest:auth && bun run build:server:api:rest:asset && bun run build:server:api:rest:inference && bun run build:server:state
scripts.test:1_db_unit: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_state_manager && bun test ./test/1_test_db_unit.ts && bun run server:run-command up vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_state_manager -d
scripts.client:dev:reinstall: bun run clean:sdk && bun run install:sdk && bun run build:sdk && bun run clean:client:web_babylon_js && bun run install:client:web_babylon_js
scripts.client:autonomous-agent: bun run install:playwright && bun vircadia.cli.ts client:autonomous-agent
scripts.client:dev: export VRCA_CLIENT_WEB_BABYLON_JS_DEBUG=1 && export VRCA_CLIENT_WEB_BABYLON_JS_DEBUG_SESSION_TOKEN=$(bun run server:postgres:system-token true) && bun run clean:sdk && bun run install:sdk && bun run build:sdk && bun run clean:repo && bun run clean:client:web_babylon_js && bun run install:client:web_babylon_js && cd ../client/web_babylon_js/ && bun run dev
scripts.server:init: bun run install:sdk && bun run build:sdk && bun run install:repo && bun run build:server:api:ws && bun run build:server:api:rest:auth && bun run build:server:api:rest:asset && bun run build:server:api:rest:inference && bun run build:server:state && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_postgres -d && bun run server:postgres:health --db --timeout 60000 && bun run server:postgres:migrate && bun run server:postgres:seed:sql && bun run server:postgres:seed:assets && bun run server:postgres:mark-as-ready && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_ws_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_rest_inference_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_state_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_pgweb -d
scripts.server:init-all: bun run server:init && bun run server:caddy:up && bun run server:client:web_babylon_js:up
scripts.server:rebuild-all: bun run server:run-command down -v vircadia_world_client_web_babylon_js vircadia_world_caddy vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_inference_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb vircadia_world_postgres && bun run server:init-all
scripts.server:rebuild-core: bun run server:run-command down -v vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_inference_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb vircadia_world_postgres && bun run server:init
scripts.server:health-all: bun run server:api:rest:auth:health && bun run server:api:rest:asset:health && bun run server:api:rest:inference:health && bun run server:state:health && bun run server:pgweb:health && bun run server:postgres:health && bun run server:client:web_babylon_js:health && bun run server:caddy:health
scripts.server:up: bun run server:run-command up -d vircadia_world_postgres vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_inference_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb
scripts.server:up:build: bun run server:run-command up --build -d vircadia_world_postgres vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_inference_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb
scripts.server:down: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_inference_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb vircadia_world_postgres
scripts.server:client:web_babylon_js:up: bun run build:client:web_babylon_js:docker && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_client_web_babylon_js -d
scripts.server:api:ws:up: bun run build:server:api:ws && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_ws_manager -d
scripts.server:api:rest:auth:up: bun run build:server:api:rest:auth && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager -d
scripts.server:api:rest:asset:up: bun run build:server:api:rest:asset && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager -d
scripts.server:api:rest:inference:up: bun run build:server:api:rest:inference && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_rest_inference_manager -d
scripts.server:state:up: bun run build:server:state && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_state_manager -d
scripts.server:pgweb:up: bun run build:server:pgweb && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_pgweb -d
scripts.server:postgres:up: bun run build:server:postgres && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_postgres -d
scripts.server:postgres:backup: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_client_web_babylon_js vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb && bun vircadia.cli.ts server:postgres:backup && bun run server:run-command up -d
scripts.server:postgres:restore: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_client_web_babylon_js vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb && bun vircadia.cli.ts server:postgres:restore && bun run server:run-command up -d
scripts.server:postgres:reset: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_client_web_babylon_js vircadia_world_api_ws_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_auth_manager vircadia_world_api_rest_asset_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb && bun run server:postgres:wipe && bun run server:postgres:migrate && bun run server:postgres:seed:sql && bun run server:postgres:seed:assets && bun run server:run-command up -d
scripts.project:init: bun run install:all && bun run project:configure && bun run server:init-core
